_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Rāhu, lord of demons - foremost in size of life-form
A Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha - the best in this world
The foremost in different aspects [an4.1: Rāhu - foremost in size of life-form
Māra - sovereignty, shining with power and glory
The Buddha's superiority (a list separat: Above, below, all round, as far as the earth extends
In all the world with its gods
